msg: Serializer component: secondary snapshot processing for User Preferences (and entities)

author: gshimansky
msg: Applied HARMONY-3002 [drlvm] Race condition in threading code leads to VM crash on SMP systems on HARMONY-2386
Tests passed on Ubuntu6 x86, Windows 2003 server x86, SuSE9 x86 and x86_64
